label: Weapon 1
comment: -1 to match up with weapon/armor indices; the data for these fields uses 0 for "nothing" and bumps the rest up

label: Damage
comment: Note: If you equip/de-equip things, you'll have to update this too. The game is too dumb to recalculate it. Formula is weapon attack + str / 2, or lvl*2 for unarmed BB

label: Evade %
comment: Field width is questionable, all the others are 1 byte

label: Magic Defense
comment: Field width is questionable, all the others are 1 byte
